title: Is my PAN card compulsory during document submission
content: I haven't had it made yet and I'm not 18 so they can't open bank account yet. Idk what to do . Will they postpone last date of counselling? What do I do I have all other documents.

comments.body: I was in the same situation last year , it's not compulsory
during document submission they did not ask for pan card (at least for me)
PAN is not required to open a bank account.U need that only to validate debit cards and UPI.
